Tidy Ranges Tutorial nullranges devel team 2021-11-08 Chapter 1 Packages These examples focus on the packages dplyr, plyranges, nullranges, and excluderanges.

Chapter 2 Join example library(dplyr) ## ## Attaching package: 'dplyr' ## The following object is masked from 'package:testthat': ## ## matches ## The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': ## ## filter, lag ## The following objects are masked from 'package:base': ## ## intersect, setdiff, setequal, union library(tidyr) ## ## Attaching package: 'tidyr' ## The following object is masked from 'package:testthat': ## ## matches library(randomNames) ## randomNames 1.5-0.0 (4-21-2021). For help: >help("randomNames") or visit https://centerforassessment.github.io/randomNames m <- 17 # size of class n <- 100 # size of population nf <- 12 # number of friends set.seed(5) people <- randomNames(m + n, name.order="first.last", name.sep=" ") pop <- data.frame(person=people[-(1:m)], birthday=sample(31, n, TRUE)) friends <- data.frame(friend=sample(people, nf)) class_people <- people[1:m] loop <- rep(1:m, each=nf) idx <- as.vector(replicate(m, sample(n, nf))) class <- data.frame(classmate=class_people[loop], friend=pop$person[idx], birthday=pop$birthday[idx]) class <- class %>% arrange(classmate) %>% mutate(classmate=factor(classmate)) shared_friends <- friends %>% inner_join(class, by="friend") %>% arrange(classmate, friend) %>% relocate(classmate) shared_friends %>% group_by(classmate) %>% summarize(in_common=n(), median_bday=median(birthday)) %>% complete(classmate, fill=list(count=0)) ## # A tibble: 17 Ã— 3 ## classmate in_common median_bday ## <fct> <int> <dbl> ## 1 Aaliyah Minter NA NA ## 2 Brandon Jones 4 14 ## 3 Christopher Herron 2 11 ## 4 Collin Leon NA NA ## 5 Haley Polhamus 2 19 ## 6 Juan Villegas Cabrera 3 30 ## 7 Khaalid el-Ammar NA NA ## 8 Kianna Mcalevy NA NA ## 9 Maazin al-Ismael NA NA ## 10 Maisara el-Arshad 3 15 ## 11 Michael Mcgill 2 14 ## 12 Noah Pettinger 2 16.5 ## 13 Orion Villani 1 5 ## 14 Shane Ranaldi 2 22.5 ## 15 Stephanie Hernandez 1 29 ## 16 Xavier Urueta NA NA ## 17 Zachary Roe-Huffman 1 15
